description: This file defines an interface class 'IOmiProxy' in the 'omi' namespace for interacting with an omi_dbus_api. It includes methods for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles, and for registering and unregistering error listeners. The class serves as a wrapper to simplify API interactions and signal handling.

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class providing methods to interact with omi_dbus_api, including mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given container ID, filesystem image path, and config path, returning the decrypted config JSON path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle specified by container ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback, returning a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters an error listener given its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
